The staff are so backlogged on orders, you're gonna have to wait a lot longer.
author: Maki O.

description: The wait for this was really long. The boba is not actually boba. It is really gross. Do not recommend at all. They have extremely bad customer service and bad organization. They took sprite and added color. They also added too much  sweetener and it didn't taste good in general. It was legitimately disappointing and it was worst quality boba that I have ever eaten. In fact, it had the consistency of rubber. If there was a zero star, this is what I would rate it that!!! Didn't try the eggettes. The prices are pretty cheap though, which was a surprise to me.
author: Emi T.

description: Ok the eggets are pretty good but DO NOT GET THE DRINKS. They taste like cough syrup and the boba is awful. It's a weird texture overly sweet and just a bad drink experience overall. DO NOT I REPEAT DO NOT GET A DRINK STICK TO EGGETS!!!!!!!!!!!!!
author: Joesy M.

description: Why would you changed the egg shape to waffle shaped. Disappointed, the name should be waffotic instead.
author: Eric M.

description: I only tried 2 items here. I love the coco coco nana that's the only waffle I get and it tastes great. The drinks tastes mediocre. I saw a staff member dig thru the trash and didn't wash her hands only changed gloves. Ew. Everybody sees them touching the food and they should wash their hand before putting a new glove
author: Russell T.

description: I tried the galaxy drink with crystal boba and the boba was hard to chew i wouldn't say its good and I wouldn't say its bad, but thats just my opinion. Try it if you're interested.
author: Marian P.

description: A lot of people hype up for this place and a lot of people go there but the drinks are not very good.But they are not very expensive and the drinks the lights up are very cool.
author: Hla M.

description: Wait is horrible; take 15 inline and 2i0mins to get the food; the yum one is better than other; but overall just ok; don't think I'll come back; other place has better one
author: serena j.

description: I thought I'll give this new spot a try with my bf but we were rather disappointed. We came to Eggxotic on a Thursday afternoon at around 6:00pm and it was crowded. We waited for awhile in line to purchase our food and drinks. There were a few people complaining for the wait and tried to get their refunds because they can no longer wait for their eggettes. I have no complains on the wait for the drinks because it was quicker than the eggettes. I literally waited for ONE HOUR for just one order of Double Yam eggettes. If I knew the line was that damn long, I probably wouldn't have purchase the eggettes. It was nothing special and I felt like I wasted an hour of my time. The girl taking order was very kind and sweet, but the girls working at the eggettes station literally look like they were taking their sweet time. I understand that eggettes takes time to cook but the workers look so chill. Like why aren't you guys cleaning up the mess? Not gonna lie, the eggettes station looks like a mess. The drinks overall was a disappointment. The Pink Lady drink tasted like 80% milk and then 20% strawberry. The Galaxy drink was SO sweet but the glow in the dark was very cool. The Rainbow drink was SO sweet too. It seems like all their drinks are very sweet, like 110% or something. Probably not going to be back again because of the long line and how unsanitary they are.
author: Jinnie W.

description: I was here on Friday and tried to order their signature Oreo flavor eggette but they said they only have Oreo waffle. I was already disappointment by it. The taste of the Oreo flavor was even worst. It had coconut inside and the Oreo flavor did not taste like Oreo. Wasted my time and money on this place. My first time but also my LAST time here.
author: Donna D.

description: Place is okay, the drinks are mediocre and flavor wise they're i'd say a 5 outta 10. What i don't like is how i was sipping my drink and a fatass lemon chunk flew into my mouth. Yea fresh lemonade is always better but atleast strain it beforehand.
author: Nathan P.

description: I was really excited to try this place out and it turned out to be HORRIBLE! I can only say this for the drinks, i didn't bother getting the egg puffs because it was a 50 minute wait. I saw the way that they make the drinks and I can't believe what I saw. I believe they have a rainbow fading drink with butterfly pee DONT BUY IT! Save your money,buy a sprite and add some water. I thought in my head when I tried it that it tasted like a watered down Shirley temple. Once I saw how it was made it really just is . They add water, sprite, and some strawberry flavoring. That was already bad enough then I saw that they use the same mixing spoon over and over leaving it on the counter and using it again without washing it.
author: Destini N.

description: I bought a bunch of different flavors of. Each of them good in their own way.. Got to try the garlic crab egg puff.
author: Brandon C.

description: Nothing "eggxotic" about this place that is worth 40 minutes of my time. That's right.. it took 40 minutes to get soggy, barely cooked waffles. I would have finished eating at Ihop in 40minutes. Won't come back.
author: Lex l.
